structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Reports and records -- Compliance with KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

text.section: The park board shall keep a set of books showing the receipts and expenditures of the board. The books shall at all times be subject to examination by the mayor or any committee of the legislative body authorized to make such examination, either by themselves or by a certified public accountant. The board shall each January transmit to the mayor and legislative body a full and detailed report and statement of the acts of the board for the preceding year, with a complete and itemized account of all receipts and disbursements of money and an itemized estimate of the money needed for park and playground purposes.
The board shall comply with the provisions of KRS 65A.010 to 65A.090.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 47, effective March 21, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3606d-8.
